conversations.conversation: We may differ in shape Or even be alike. We may do things together Or even have the same thought. BEING ARROGANT IS A VERY EFFECTIVE WAY TO RUIN YOUR REPUTATION.
Better is a little with the fear of the LORD, Than great treasure with trouble. (2) Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, Than a fatted calf with hatred.

The poor man's hated even by his own neighbor, but the rich has many friends. He who despises his neighbor sins; But he who has mercy on the poor, happy is he. Do they not go astray who devise evil? But mercy and truth belong to those who devise good.

The name of the Lord is a strong tower; The righteous run to it and are safe. The rich man's wealth is his strong city, And like a high wall in his own esteem. Oh I love this word With God all things are Possible.
Pls will you be my Love because i desire to choose you?

If you want to help someone through give, try to give the person the give that will make him/her to feeled good. And remember that is only God you've to give the Great Gift. I want you to know that through the give Noah give God. God stand up on His throne and say to Noah' because of your give I will not curse the earth again. So, I want you to think about the kind of give you can give someone in your life which can make him or her to Bless everyone . Your gift that you give to only one person, it can help someone else. God bless you for taking the new step hence.
